html:
2026-0106
2026-02-05FINCustoms TariffOrder Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025)Order Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025) in order to extend remission to any importer in respect of products that have been determined to be necessary for public health and healthcare or that have been determined to be in short supply, that have been imported on a time-limited basis or due to exceptional circumstances that could have significant adverse impacts on the Canadian economy, such as preexisting contractual obligations.Registration: SOR/2026-0016 Publication Date: 2026-02-25
subject: Order Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025)
precis: Order Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025) in order to extend remission to any importer in respect of products that have been determined to be necessary for public health and healthcare or that have been determined to be in short supply, that have been imported on a time-limited basis or due to exceptional circumstances that could have significant adverse impacts on the Canadian economy, such as preexisting contractual obligations.
